narrative:
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection. 
The applicant has met the licensing requirements and wishes to be a class "C" exhibitor.  A check for the licensing
fee will be mailed to the Animal Care office In Raleigh, NC, by the applicant.
Exit interview conducted with facility representative.
NO REGULATED ACTIVITIES ALLOWED UNTIL A LICENSE IS OBTAINED.
The inspection report was sent by email.
